Plot summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Plot summary: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love fo...

Title: Drishyam

Title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag

Title: Andhadhun

Plot summary: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

Title: Udaan

Plot summary: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

Plot summary: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imper...

Title: Bajirao Mastani

Title: Talvar

Title: Dabangg

Title: Wake Up Sid

Plot summary: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty and forms an obsessive love for the Queen of Me...

Title: Highway

Title: Anand

Title: Holiday: A Soldier Is Never Off Duty

Title: Sarfarosh

Crew-writers: Vakkantham Vamsi, Rajat Arora, Keith Gomes
Plot summary: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

Title: 2 States
Cast: Arjun Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Amrita Singh
Crew-writers: Chetan Bhagat, Abhishek Varman, Hussain Dalal
Plot summary: This movie chronicles how Chetan met his wife and the difficulties they faced due to their cultural differences.

Title: Dhoom 2
Cast: Hrithik Roshan, Abhishek Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Crew-writers: Vijay Krishna Acharya, Aditya Chopra
Plot summary: Mr A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artefacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but who cannot be trusted. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.

Title: Badhaai Ho
Cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Neena Gupta, Gajraj Rao
Crew-writers: Akshat Ghildial, Jyoti Kapoor, Shantanu Srivastava
Plot summary: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

Title: Zero
Cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Katrina Kaif
Crew-writers: Himanshu Sharma
